Definition: This task is to convert a sentence, which is given in the English language, to the Swedish language. Note that you need to make sure to not translate the numbers and keep them as it is. Additionally, the translated sentence should have the nouns and the first word of each sentence capitalized.

Positive Examples.input: You have requested a debate on this subject in the course of the next few days, during this part-session.
Positive Examples.output: Ni har begärt en debatt i ämnet under sammanträdesperiodens kommande dagar.
Positive Examples.explanation: English sentence is properly converted into Swedish sentence.

Positive Examples.input: In the meantime, I should like to observe a minute' s silence, as a number of Members have requested, on behalf of all the victims concerned, particularly those of the terrible storms, in the various countries of the European Union.
Positive Examples.output: Till dess vill jag att vi, som ett antal kolleger begärt, håller en tyst minut för offren för bl.a. stormarna i de länder i Europeiska unionen som drabbats.
Positive Examples.explanation: English sentence is properly converted into Swedish sentence.

Positive Examples.input: If the House agrees, I shall do as Mr Evans has suggested.
Positive Examples.output: Om kammaren instämmer skall jag göra som herr Evans föreslagit.
Positive Examples.explanation: English sentence is properly converted into Swedish sentence.

Negative Examples.explanation: The conversion of English to Swedish is wrong because output missed one part from the input, i.e., debate.
The conversion of English to Swedish is wrong because output did ot translate " Thank you very much " and instead of that it puts some other words (which do not mean Thank you very much).
